home.subtitle: How can I help you today?

slides.title: Object Detection
slides.description: Point your camera to identify objects around you in real-time.

slides.title: Scan Text & Voice
slides.description: Convert text from images or voice recordings into a format you can listen to.

slides.title: Emergency Call
slides.description: Quickly contact your emergency contacts through an integrated video call.

accessibility.skipHint: Skips the introduction and goes straight to the app.
accessibility.nextHint: Proceeds to the next introduction page.
accessibility.getStartedHint: Finishes the introduction and starts using the app.

permissions.camera: We need your permission to use the camera
permissions.microphone: We need your permission to use the microphone
permissions.gallery: You need to grant gallery permissions to use this feature.
permissions.cameraDenied: Camera permission is disabled. Please enable it in the phone settings.
permissions.microphoneDenied: Microphone permission is disabled. Please enable it in the phone settings.

scanResult.title: Scan Result
scanResult.imageProcessingFailed: Failed to process image, please try again.

voiceScreen.title: Voice
voiceScreen.recordingFailed: Failed to start recording. Make sure microphone permission is granted.

general.networkError: Failed to connect to the server. Check your internet connection.
general.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again later.
general.serverError: An error occurred on the server.

auth.fillData: Fill in your data to get started
auth.passwordMin8Chars: Password must be at least 8 characters.
auth.passwordNeedsLowercase: Password must contain a lowercase letter.
auth.passwordNeedsUppercase: Password must contain an uppercase letter.
auth.instructionsSentSuccess: Instructions to reset your password have been sent to your email.
auth.premiumFeatureMessage: You must register or log in to use the Call feature.
auth.googleLoginError: An error occurred while trying to log in with Google.
auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again manually.
auth.forgotPasswordSubtitle: Don't worry! Enter your email to receive password reset instructions.

accessibility.forgotPasswordHint: Navigates to the forgot password page.
accessibility.registerHint: Navigates to the new account registration page.

dialogs.logoutConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to log out of your account?
dialogs.deleteContactMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this contact?

call.answerFailed: Failed to answer, the call may have ended.
call.connectionFailed: Failed to connect to the server.

accessibility.cameraStateOn: Your camera is currently off. Tap to turn on.
accessibility.cameraStateOff: Your camera is currently on. Tap to turn off.
accessibility.micStateOn: You are currently muted. Tap to unmute.
accessibility.micStateOff: You are currently unmuted. Tap to mute.
accessibility.switchCameraHint: Switches between front and back camera.

accessibility.addContactHint: Adds the filled contact to the list.
